head: PACKAGING CAPABILITIES
description: JASS MAX1 Lubricants is a leading provider of private label lubricants for a variety of industries. The JASS MAX1 Lubricants team can custom blend to any specification and obtain any necessary qualifications as requested. Products can be packaged in quarts, gallons, pails, drums, and bulk.

head: CUSTOM TRAINING PROGRAMS
description: The JASS MAX1 Lubricants team can provide on-site and in-depth training with your team on the features and benefits of the products produced under your private label.

head: SALES TRAINING & MARKETING TOOLS
description: JASS MAX1 Lubricants in-house marketing and graphic design team can work with you to create eye-catching artwork and labeling that accurately reflects your brand. Additionally, JASS MAX1 Lubricants assists customers with flyers, brochures, product data sheets, and safety data sheets.

head: FREE CONSULTATIVE SERVICES
description: Choosing the right product mix for your company is crucial to the success of your private label launch. The JASS MAX1 Lubricants team has years of knowledge and experience that you can leverage to make the best purchasing decisions for your business.
